original_title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Six
overview: He Can't Bite, But His Dogs Can!- Some years ago the far northern bush telegraph alerted Croc to an extremely unusual story....  Back when dogs were considered not suitable for working the vast hot northern distances, a bushman perched in a tree was roping large rank feral bulls, with the aid of of his working dogs. With this adventure being filmed off horseback, it is a story we have been privileged to capture. You may not believe it until you see it!
title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Six
